text: Volodymyr Korolkov (; born 31 January 1986) is a professional Ukrainian football forward who currently plays for FC Hirnyk-Sport Horishni Plavni in the Ukrainian First League. Korolkov is a product of couple of the Odesa city football academies including Chornomorets and Ukrposhta as well as FC Shakhtar Donetsk. He became noticeable during the 2014-15 Ukrainian First League season when he scored 8 goals playing for Hirnyk-Sport. ==References == ==External links== * * Category:1986 births Category:Living people Category:People from Berezivka Category:Ukrainian footballers Category:FC Shakhtar-2 Donetsk players Category:FC Shakhtar-3 Donetsk players Category:FC Ivan Odessa players Category:SC Olkom Melitopol players Category:FC Knyazha Shchaslyve players Category:FC Knyazha-2 Shchaslyve players Category:FC Feniks-Illichovets Kalinine players Category:FC Real Pharma Odesa players Category:FC Zhemchuzhyna Yalta players Category:FC Hirnyk-Sport Horishni Plavni players Category:Ukraine youth international footballers Category:Association football forwards Category:Ukrainian First League players
title: Volodymyr Korolkov
